import React, { useState } from "react"; import { LiquidGlassCard, LiquidGlassCardContent, LiquidGlassCardDescription, LiquidGlassCardHeader, LiquidGlassCardTitle } from "../components/ui/liquid-glass"; import { LiquidGlassButton } from "../components/ui/liquid-glass-button"; import { AppleRevealText, BikeBearText } from "../components/BikeBearAnimations"; import { FadeIn, ScaleIn, StaggerContainer, StaggerItem } from "../components/ScrollAnimations"; import { Badge } from "../components/ui/badge"; import { Tabs, TabsContent, TabsList, TabsTrigger } from "../components/ui/tabs"; import { CheckCircle, Monitor, HardDrive, Cpu, ShieldCheck, Phone } from "lucide-react"; import { products } from "../mock/data"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Products = () => { const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState("all"); const categories = [ { id: "all", label: "All Products", icon: }, { id: "Hardware", label: "Hardware", icon: }, { id: "Software", label: "Software", icon: } ]; const filteredProducts = selectedCategory === "all" ? products : products.filter(product => product.category === selectedCategory); const getSubcategoryIcon = (subcategory) => { const icons = { "Laptops": , "Desktops": , "Components": , "Operating Systems": }; return icons[subcategory] || ; }; const getCategoryColor = (category) => { const colors = { "Hardware": "bg-blue-500/20 text-blue-300 border-blue-400/30", "Software": "bg-green-500/20 text-green-300 border-green-400/30" }; return colors[category] || "bg-gray-500/20 text-gray-300 border-gray-400/30"; }; return (

{filteredProducts.map((product, index) => (
{product.category}

{product.brands.map((brand, brandIndex) => ( {brand} ))}

  • {feature}

)}

{[ { icon: , title: "Genuine Products", description: "100% authentic products with full manufacturer warranty" }, { icon: , title: "Expert Selection", description: "Carefully curated products that meet our quality standards" }, { icon: , title: "Full Support", description: "Complete after-sales support and technical assistance" }, { icon: , title: "Competitive Pricing", description: "Best prices in the market with flexible payment options" } ].map((item, index) => (
{item.icon}

{item.title}

 ))}

); }; export default Products;
